qrCodeProject.containers.Homepage.title: Welcome to
qrCodeProject.containers.Homepage.descri: In a traditional setting and a family atmosphere, our restaurant offers regional cuisine that you can enjoy in the large room or under the beautiful shady terrace surrounded by beautiful arcades. The restaurant at me, welcomes you throughout the day from breakfast to dinner. Groups are welcome, as the restaurant has a capacity of up to 50 seats. The covered terrace can accommodate up to 75 people. Take advantage of your holiday to enjoy delicious regional dishes on the terrace!
